text: New England Cable News is a regional 24-hour cable news television network. It is owned and operated by NBCUniversal serving the New England region of the United States. It was launched in 1992. It focuses on regional news, though in some low priority timeslots, paid programming and programming from WNBC such as Talk Stoop and Open House are seen. Category:American television channels Category:1992 establishments in the United States
title: New England Cable News
